verses.name: Jeremiah 13:14
verses.text: And I will dash them one against another, even the fathers and the sons together, saith the Lord: I will not pity, nor spare, nor have mercy, but destroy them.

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:15
verses.text: Hear ye, and give ear; be not proud: for the Lord hath spoken.

verses.name: Jeremiah 13:16
verses.text: Give glory to the Lord your God, before he cause darkness, and before your feet stumble upon the dark mountains, and, while ye look for light, he turn it into the shadow of death, and make it gross darkness.
